titleStmt.title: Haman's vanity, or, A sermon displaying the birthlesse issues of church-destroying adversaries. Preached to the Honourable House of Commons at their late solemne thanksgiving, being on June 15. 1643. By Obadiah Sedgwick, Batchelor in Divinity, and Pastor of Coggeshall in Essex. Published by order of that House.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, Obadiah, 1600?-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R. Bishop, for Samuel Gellibrand at the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard
